sentences.en: But the APA waiver does not extend to claims for " money damages ".
sentences.cn: 但《行政程序法》的放弃并未扩大到包括 " 金钱索赔 " 在内.

sentences.en: Can students from 13 - year system choose to join the 4 - year program, with standing or credit waiver?
sentences.cn: 十三年制的中学生可否选择入读四年制课程, 并获得学分转移或豁免?

sentences.en: Corporate Officers and Business Unit Presidents maybe granted a waiver only by the Board of Directors.
sentences.cn: 公司职员和营业单位总统也许由理事仅授予放弃.

sentences.en: Credit Card and a 1 - year fee waiver.
sentences.cn: 现在就申请附属卡,享有1年免年费.

sentences.en: If you have proper reason, they may permit your application fee waiver.
sentences.cn: 如果你有正当理由, 他们可能会批准你免申请费.

sentences.en: In December, public housing cost came down sharply , owing to the waiver of public housing rentals.
sentences.cn: 此外, 公共住屋费用因豁免公屋租金而在十二月骤降.

sentences.en: Is there any process for getting a waiver for test cases?
sentences.cn: 是否有获得测试用例豁免的流程?

sentences.en: Jack Sparrow : I love those moments. I like to waiver them as they pass by.
sentences.cn: 我爱这些时刻. 我喜欢当它们到来时放弃它们.

sentences.en: On the same day, the waiver of personal savings deposit interest tax.
sentences.cn: 同日, 个人储蓄存款暂免征收利息税.

sentences.en: That price includes full collision waiver and unlimited mileage.
sentences.cn: 这个价格包括全额免碰撞保险服务,并且不限里程.

sentences.en: The farm loan waiver will, inevitably, start a flurry of me - too announcements.
sentences.cn: 此次的农村贷款减免将不可避免地引来一系列“我也要”的呼声.

sentences.en: The price for hiring car includes full collision waiver and unlimited mileage.
sentences.cn: 租车的价格包含碰撞免全责,行车里程不受限制.

sentences.en: The proposal includes waiver provisions under specified conditions.
sentences.cn: 该议案包含特定条件下的除外条款.
减免学费 、 奖学金和助学金等.

trans.tran_en: an official written statement saying that a right, legal process etc can be waived
